text: Anɨb agelak, Pol takaw kɨlop ak dɨl, mɨnek bɨ omɨŋal omɨŋal anɨb okok ayɨp, God takaw ne pal ak kɨdek gɨl, wɨdɨn mɨdup ne adek sɨŋak teplep yonɨgabun agɨl gɨlak. Anɨgɨl, God agnɨgep kal awl ak amɨl, Pol bɨawl yelak okok kɨlop agak, Chɨn ñɨn akal teplep yonɨgabun, anep kagol ak mɨdɨl, ñɨn adek ak, God nop tap ñeb ogɨnap keke dad apɨl, nop sɨbog ñɨnɨgabun agak.
